actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary, H. Rept. 96-615.
Measure recommitted to Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Ball State University and the American Association of Colleges for Teacher Education.

summary.text: Relieves a named university and a named association of liability to the United States for a specified amount representing reimbursements for costs actually incurred but in excess of contractual provision. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to refund a specified amount already paid by such association.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Ball State University and the American Association of Colleges for Teacher Education.
